About Us SenteFinder focuses on providing financial service information to consumers, enabling them to compare the suitability of the services offered to them by various financial service providers, based on their specific needs. Services considered are borrowing, saving, sending and withdrawing money. SenteFinder is using data from OpenStreetMap(OSM)
The icons in this app are from" " ICONS8 "\u00a9" Developed by Laboremus Uganda Ltd
